title: (x) Bed Head distressed typewriter font - VT Corona {Paul H}
content:
[http://www.funkhairsalon.com/Imagenes/BedHead\_Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090718151142/http:/www.funkhairsalon.com/Imagenes/BedHead_Logo.jpg)

Is this a font. If it is, what font is it?

Thanks.
author: MSmith

comments.content: looks like one of the thousands of distressed typewriter fonts you can find on sites like dafont... pookie? harting? mom’s typewriter?

Trixie is a better option if you want an alternate

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-trixie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090718151142/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-trixie/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-trixie/")

Tim

search, Search, SEARCH!
